name: Wazooo[dot]exe
description:
Play as Wazooo, a fictional robot person who wants to blow things up. See how many coins you can collect in the fastest time possible, all while avoiding the slimes.

  • A/D: Move horizontal
  • Space: Jump
  • W/S (hold): Peek up and down
  • More features can be unlocked!

Original idea by Mike Guthrie-Plouffe and Brian Raine.

The base for this was created over a weekend October 2020, with a couple of weeks of work put into it in the following December.

Keypad [./period] enables a fun debug state. Try it out!

Changelog

  • 0.1.1:
    • Initial release
  • 0.1.2:
    • Created better tutorial area for hover boots
    • Created better tutorial area for hover jump
    • Adjusted Slimeboss: slower and smaller
    • Fixed player hit FX
    • Ability unlock notifications now dismissed by Esc or onscreen button
  • 0.1.3:
    • Created better tutorial area for melee attack
    • Added sign pointing to ranged attack
    • Added glowing lines between gates and associated switches
    • Added more stats for end screen: Abilities Unlocked and Slimes Vanquished

KNOWN ISSUES

  • Platform friction breaks jumps - this can be annoying, but there's not an easy quick fix that I could find. Implementing Unity's Platform Effectors causes some other stuff to break.

FUTURE DEVELOPMENT WISHLIST

  • Slime Boss hit SFX / VFX
  • Ranged Attack shoot & hit SFX / VFX
